scripts.build:chrome: cd .. && mkdir -p dist && cd src && zip -r ../dist/marksnip-chrome-$(node -p "require('./manifest.json').version").zip . -x '*.git*' -x '*tests/*' -x '*node_modules/*' -x 'package*.json' -x 'jest.config.js' -x 'playwright.config.js' -x '*.DS_Store'
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:chrome
scripts.start:androidwin11: adb connect 127.0.0.1:58526 && web-ext run -t firefox-android --adb-device 127.0.0.1:58526 --firefox-apk org.mozilla.fenix
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
